name: gnotobiotic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in which there are no unknown microorganisms (= very small organisms): Studies in gnotobiotic rats did not reveal any significant effects. These findings are consistent with the results of a previous study in gnotobiotic calves.
More examplesFewer examplesSimilar results were found when the experiments were carried out in gnotobiotic rats.He suggests that using gnotobiotic cows would be one way of reducing the risks of drinking unpasteurized milk.The microbiological flora of gnotobiotic animals is known.Water for animals in gnotobiotic isolators must be sterile.The mice were gnotobiotic rather than germ-free.
